Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.

Name: tangbot1111
Title: Best Team Outing
Review: Lazer Ops is one of the best physical indoor game zones for the team playing, You will get a good exercise here

Name: Raajkumar1991
Title: Best place for team activity
Review: We went to this place as a part of our office team activity. It is a very good place to enjoy the lazer game. Sufficient place is there to run and hide as well. Bunkers are also designed very perfectly. overall it is very good. But the managers of the place are not so pleasant.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Good place to enjoy a laser tag game
Review: I visited this place twice- once with my friends and once with my office colleagues. The floor is quite big and the equipment is top notch.

Name: Zain A
Title: Great place to celebrate birthday party for the kids
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Vivek G
Title: good place
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Could offer more customization in the gameplay
Review: I have been to many Laser tag place in the US and this one meets international standards. The staff was helpful and helped our group of 12 to be split into two teams. The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.
Review: one of the few laser tag places in the city. it is an unbelievable workout and too much fun. It is also very addictive

Name: meet_smokie3s
Title: Good place to visit with friends
Review: The gear is in good shape. You get about 20 mins of gameplay. It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

Name: anvesh2502
Title: Good adrenalin rush!
Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Name: Al U
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Review: Had a lotta fun in this place with my girlfriend. Location is great and price is just right. Will try to come back for more.
